data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of deep-water tetillid sponges (Porifera, Demospongiae, Spirophorina) from Brazil, with description of three new species and new characters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandez, Julio C. C., Rodriguez, Pablo R. D., Santos, George G., Pinheiro, Ulisses, Muricy, Guilherme (2018): Taxonomy of deep-water tetillid sponges (Porifera, Demospongiae, Spirophorina) from Brazil, with description of three new species and new characters. Zootaxa 4429 (1): 53-88, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4429.1.2
